title: Server & Network - Change Device VLAN
description: A client has moved a printer to a new location in the office and it can no longer be reached, likely because it needs to be on a different VLAN.

tasks.description: Identify the new wall port the printer is plugged into and its corresponding switch port.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technician knows which switch port to reconfigure.

tasks.description: Check the configuration of the switch port and find it's on the default 'Data' VLAN.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technician confirms the current VLAN assignment is incorrect for a printer.

tasks.description: Change the VLAN on the switch port to the 'Printers' VLAN.
tasks.expected_outcome: The printer gets a correct IP address and is now accessible on the network.
